Articles.Content: I was wondering what the best altitude was for Kethane scanning. (By best I mean quickest.) So if you have any ideas, I would like to hear them.

As long as it scans hex by hex and doesn't interpolate during time warp, I find it's better to do it in semi-polar LKO just above atmosphere, leave it at 1x speed and go weed your garden.

When they make kethane scanner work like the ScanSat ones, however, that'll be entirely different story altogether...
